We assist our clients with a broad array of civil disputes, working closely and efficiently to protect their legal rights. Our attorneys have extensive litigation and trial experience, which helps them provide personal and effective legal representation for both public and private companies, as well as individuals.

Our litigation experience involves:

  • cases regarding intellectual property, business and commercial activity, trust and estate
  • early resolution of disputes
  • managinaging all phases of litigation, from initial case assesment and discovery to pleading, trial and appeal

Whatever your litigation issue is, we at Horowitz Law group are dedicated to achieving results for our clients. Call us today to schedule your initial consultation.
